resources.string: Add more features with the Pro Extension
Allow all applications to rotate. Needs a reboot to work properly
Click here to add a new button to the list of selections
Add a secondary button to enable multi options
Click here to remove this button and it\'s configuration
Press the key that you wish to add
The key already exists in the collection
The selected key has been removed
The module configurations has been reloaded

This Application only handles the configurations. The features itselfs is in the module, which you will need to enable in XposedInstaller fallowed by a reboot.\n\nSome of the configurations such as intercepting key codes will not work until the module is enabled. So please make sure to enable the module and reboot the device before continuing.

Because Xposed Modules changes Android\'s behavior during Runtime in a non-standard way, and because some Custom or Stock ROM\'s might have changed some things in the original Android sources, there is always a small chance that this will not work.\n\nIf you have any issues with features not working, please send an email or visit the XDA Thread (Addresses can be found on Play Store).
Re-map Awake is disabled on the Primary Button
Re-map Sleep is disabled on the Primary Button
